short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly pick and manage colors for web development with precision and ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Color Picker for Developer - Ultimate Tool for Developers

Enhance your web development workflow with Color Picker , the ultimate Chrome extension designed to simplify color selection and management. Pick colors from anywhere in your browser with ease and access a suite of powerful features:

Pick Colors Anywhere: Effortlessly capture any color from any webpage.
Save Colors :  Save your favorite colors to revisit them anytime.
Sort Colors : Organize your saved colors for quick access and better project management.
Hex to RGB Converter : Instantly convert Hex values to RGB for versatile usage.
Delete Colors : Remove unwanted colors from your saved list with a single click.
Auto Copy Function : Automatically copy color codes to your clipboard for seamless integration into your projects.
Save Link: Save any link for increase productivity
